title: GDPR Dependency Component
description: Tracks data provenance to enable compliant cascading deletions for GDPR's Right to Erasure.

contributing_users.description: A set of User IDs whose data contributed to this entity's existence or state.

upstream_dependencies.description: A list of source entity IDs (e.g., Moments) that this entity (e.g., a Motif) depends on.

user_evidence_weights.description: A map of User ID to an evidence weight (0.0-1.0), used to decide if an entity should be deleted or just recomputed upon user erasure.
